content: > the written instructions for this blanket are available for ** free on my blog 1 ** the downloadable pdf listed here for sale contains written instructions and chart **facebook group** i have a facebook group where i provide support for all my patterns - join the group 2 **about the pattern** working in the round is so much fun and even the simplest of patterns look so beautiful with this technique this blanket features triangles and i love how the clean and simple design still looks so lovely this blanket is also a wonderful project especially if you re just starting with the in-the- round technique made with tunisian crochet it features a soothing 4-row repeat pattern that s so satisfying to see come together the best part is that you can adjust the size to fit your needs whether you want it large or small making this blanket has been such a joyful experience for me and i m sure you ll enjoy making it just as much this blanket is part of a 5 blanket series i designed using the same technique all the blankets in this series are available for purchase as a collection at a 20% discount **skill level** intermediate - this pattern assumes you are familiar with the basics of starting and finishing a tunisian crochet project as well as working in the round **what the pattern contains** 1 written pattern 2 chart 3 video support **sharing on social media** if you decide to share your projects on social media i would love to see them please tag your posts with ** @knitterknotter 5 #knitterknotter 6 #madewithknitterknotter 7 ** **blog** you can find all my patterns on my blog here https //knitterknotter com/patterns/ please do not copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell finished items but please credit the pattern to me arunima goel @ knitterknotter i will be happy to see your finished product s join my facebook group to share pictures of your work and to get any help you might need https //www facebook com/groups/knitterknotterhangout/ you can follow me on my blog to get updates on new patterns https //knitterknotter com **discounts** you can always find the following discounts in my shop buy 2 patterns and get 10% off add 2 patterns to your cart buy 3 patterns and get 15% off add 3 patterns to your cart buy 4 patterns and get 1 pattern of value up to $5 free add 5 patterns to your cart and the one with the lowest price will be free > this is a pattern only and not a completed item 1 https //knitterknotter com/tara-blanket-free-tunisian-crochet-in-the-round-blanket-pattern/ 2 https //www facebook com/groups/knitterknotterhangout/ 3 https //knitterknotter com/tunisian-crochet-tutorial-tunisian-knit-stitch/ 4 https //knitterknotter com/tunisian-crochet-tutorial-reverse-stitch-trs/ 5 https //www instagram com/knitterknotter/ 6 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/knitterknotter/ 7 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/madewithknitterknotter/
